Какой процент фрилансеров, считающих себ:
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv("./data/freelancer_earnings_bd.csv")
experts_less_100 = df[(df['Experience_Level'] == 'Expert') & (df['Job_Completed'] < 100)]
total_experts = df[df['Experience_Level'] == 'Expert']
result = (len(experts_less_100) / len(total_experts)) * 100
Какой средний доход у фрилансеров на пла:
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv("./data/freelancer_earnings_bd.csv")
upwork_earnings = df[df['Platform'] == 'Upwork']['Earnings_USD']
result = upwork_earnings.mean()
Насколько выше доход у фрилансеров, прин:
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv("./data/freelancer_earnings_bd.csv")
crypto_earnings = df[df['Payment_Method'] == 'Crypto']['Earnings_USD'].mean()
paypal_earnings = df[df['Payment_Method'] == 'PayPal']['Earnings_USD'].mean()
result = crypto_earnings - paypal_earnings

import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv("./data/freelancer_earnings_bd.csv")
crypto_earnings = df[df['Payment_Method'] == 'Crypto']['Earnings_USD'].mean()
other_earnings = df[df['Payment_Method'] != 'Crypto']['Earnings_USD'].mean()
result = crypto_earnings - other_earnings
Как распределяется доход фрилансеров в з:
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv("./data/freelancer_earnings_bd.csv")
income_by_region = df.groupby('Client_Region')['Earnings_USD'].mean().reset_index()
result = income_by_region
Как распределён доход фрилансеров из Евр:
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv("./data/freelancer_earnings_bd.csv")
regions = df[df['Client_Region'].isin(['Europe', 'Asia'])]
income_eu_asia = regions.groupby('Client_Region')['Earnings_USD'].mean().reset_index()
result = income_eu_asia
Фрилансеры из какого региона чаще получа:
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv("./data/freelancer_earnings_bd.csv")
high_rating_freelancers = df[df['Client_Rating'] >= 4.5]
top_regions = high_rating_freelancers['Client_Region'].value_counts().reset_index()
top_regions.columns = ['Client_Region', 'count']
result = top_regions
Сколько в среднем длится выполнение прое:
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv("./data/freelancer_earnings_bd.csv")
fiverr_duration = df[df['Platform'] == 'Fiverr']['Job_Duration_Days'].mean()
result = fiverr_duration
Какой процент фрилансеров, работающих по:
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv("./data/freelancer_earnings_bd.csv")
hourly_high_rate = df[(df['Project_Type'] == 'Hourly') & (df['Hourly_Rate'] > 100)]
total_hourly = df[df['Project_Type'] == 'Hourly']
result = (len(hourly_high_rate) / len(total_hourly)) * 100
